languages.text: "Твое дворянское положение означает, что власть — в самой твоей плоти и крови. Ты никогда не усомнишься в своей правоте, не проявишь слабость, не выдашь свое волнение или страх невольным жестом или словом — по крайней мере если тебя воспитывали с тем же тщанием, что и меня когда-то. Перед тобой будут пресмыкаться губернаторы, командующие, высокородные {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}навигаторы{/g} и самодовольные лорды — нельзя допустить, чтобы они почувствовали слабину в том, кто стоит над ними".

traits.locale_text: "Твое дворянское положение означает, что власть — в самой твоей плоти и крови. Ты никогда не усомнишься в своей правоте, не проявишь слабость, не выдашь свое волнение или страх невольным жестом или словом — по крайней мере если тебя воспитывали с тем же тщанием, что и меня когда-то. Перед тобой будут пресмыкаться губернаторы, командующие, высокородные {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигаторы{/g} и самодовольные лорды — нельзя допустить, чтобы они почувствовали слабину в том, кто стоит над ними".

languages.text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."
languages.original_text: "Твое дворянское положение означает, что власть — в самой твоей плоти и крови. Ты никогда не усомнишься в своей правоте, не проявишь слабость, не выдашь свое волнение или страх невольным жестом или словом — по крайней мере если тебя воспитывали с тем же тщанием, что и меня когда-то. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

"Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

languages.text: “你的贵族出身表明，权力就流淌在你的血肉之中。如果你的贵族修养与我们那个时代的贵族修养同样彻底的话，你永远都不会怀疑自己的言行，永远都不会示弱，也永远都不会让不自觉的手势或不经意的言谈暴露你的恐惧与兴奋。许多人会在你的脚下卑躬屈膝，包括总督、指挥官、高高在上的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}，还有那些自负的领主。你要站在他们之上，绝不能让他们察觉到你身上的软弱。”
languages.original_text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

traits.locale_text: “你的贵族出身表明，权力就流淌在你的血肉之中。如果你的贵族修养与我们那个时代的贵族修养同样彻底的话，你永远都不会怀疑自己的言行，永远都不会示弱，也永远都不会让不自觉的手势或不经意的言谈暴露你的恐惧与兴奋。许多人会在你的脚下卑躬屈膝，包括总督、指挥官、高高在上的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}，还有那些自负的领主。你要站在他们之上，绝不能让他们察觉到你身上的软弱。”

languages.text: «Tu ascendencia noble es prueba de que el poder habita en tu carne y tu sangre. Nunca dudas de tus palabras y acciones, no muestras debilidad, no dejas que un gesto involuntario o una palabra descuidada muestre tu miedo o agitación, por lo menos si tu educación ha sido tan completa como lo fue la mía. Muchos se arrastrarán a tus pies. Gobernadores, comandantes, nobles {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g}, señores engreídos... y no puedes dejar que vean un solo momento de debilidad en quien los lidera».
languages.original_text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

traits.locale_text: «Tu ascendencia noble es prueba de que el poder habita en tu carne y tu sangre. Nunca dudas de tus palabras y acciones, no muestras debilidad, no dejas que un gesto involuntario o una palabra descuidada muestre tu miedo o agitación, por lo menos si tu educación ha sido tan completa como lo fue la mía. Muchos se arrastrarán a tus pies. Gobernadores, comandantes, nobles {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegantes{/g}, señores engreídos... y no puedes dejar que vean un solo momento de debilidad en quien los lidera».

languages.text: 「あなたの高貴な血統は、権力があなたの肉体と血の中に宿っている証です。あなたは決して自分の言葉や行動を疑ったり、弱さを見せたり、不本意な身振りや不注意な言葉が恐怖や動揺を裏切ることはない…少なくとも私の時代と同じくらい徹底した教育を受ければ。総督、指揮、高貴な生まれの{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}、思い上がった領主など、多くの人があなたの足元にひれ伏すでしょう。そして、彼らに上に立つ者の弱さを感じさせてはなりません」
languages.original_text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの高貴な血統は、権力があなたの肉体と血の中に宿っている証です。あなたは決して自分の言葉や行動を疑ったり、弱さを見せたり、不本意な身振りや不注意な言葉が、恐怖や動揺を裏切らないようにします。少なくとも私の時代と同じくらい丁寧に育てられていれば。総督、指揮、高貴な生まれの{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}、思い上がった領主など、多くの人があなたの足元にひれ伏すでしょう。そして、彼らに上に立つ者の弱さを感じさせてはなりません」

「あなたの高貴な血統は、権力があなたの肉体と血の中に宿っている証です。あなたは決して自分の言葉や行動を疑ったり、弱さを見せたり、不本意な身振りや不注意な言葉が恐怖や動揺を裏切ることはない…少なくとも私の時代と同じくらい徹底した教育を受ければ。総督、指揮、高貴な生まれの{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}、思い上がった領主など、多くの人があなたの足元にひれ伏すでしょう。そして、彼らに上に立つ者の弱さを感じさせてはなりません」

languages.text: « Votre noble lignage est la preuve que vous avez la puissance dans la chair et le sang. Vous ne douterez jamais de vos paroles ou de vos actes, vous ne ferez jamais preuve de faiblesse, vous ne laisserez jamais un geste involontaire ou un mot imprudent trahir vos craintes ou votre agitation... Du moins, si votre éducation a été aussi rigoureuse que la mienne. Beaucoup se prosterneront à vos pieds : gouverneurs, commandants, nobles {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g}, seigneurs arrogants... et en aucun cas ils ne devront sentir le moindre signe de faiblesse de la part de {mf|celui|celle} qui se tient au-dessus d'eux. »
languages.original_text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

traits.locale_text: « Votre noble lignage est la preuve que vous avez la puissance dans la chair et le sang. Vous ne douterez jamais de vos paroles ou de vos actes, vous ne ferez jamais preuve de faiblesse, vous ne laisserez jamais un geste involontaire ou un mot imprudent trahir vos craintes ou votre agitation... Du moins, si votre éducation a été aussi rigoureuse que la mienne. Beaucoup se prosterneront à vos pieds : gouverneurs, commandants, nobles {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateurs{/g}, seigneurs arrogants... et en aucun cas ils ne devront sentir le moindre signe de faiblesse de la part de {mf|celui|celle} qui se tient au-dessus d'eux. »

languages.text: "Eure adlige Abstammung ist ein Zeichen, dass in Eurem Fleisch und Blut Macht wohnt. Ihr würdet Eure Worte oder Handlungen niemals anzweifeln, niemals Schwäche zeigen, niemals durch eine unbeabsichtigte Geste oder ein achtloses Wort Eure Furcht oder Anspannung preisgeben – jedenfalls nicht, wenn Eure Erziehung so gründlich war wie meine damals. Viele werden sich vor Euch in den Staub werfen – Gouverneure, Commander, {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatoren{/g} höherer Abstammung, affige Lords –, und sie dürfen keine Schwäche in der Person vermuten, die über ihnen steht."
languages.original_text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

traits.locale_text: "Eure adlige Abstammung ist ein Zeichen, dass in Eurem Fleisch und Blut Macht wohnt. Viele werden sich vor Euch in den Staub werfen – Gouverneure, Commander, {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatoren{/g} höherer Abstammung, affige Lords –, und sie dürfen keine Schwäche in der Person vermuten, die über ihnen steht."

languages.text: "Asil soyun, gücün teninde ve kanında yaşadığının işareti. Sözlerinden veya eylemlerinden asla şüphe duymaz, asla zayıflık göstermez, istem dışı bir hareket ya da dikkatsiz bir kelimenin korkularını ya da tedirginliğini açık etmesine asla izin vermezsin. En azından yetiştirilme tarzın benim zamanımda olduğu kadar kusursuzsa. Pek çok kişi ayaklarına kapanacak: Valiler, komutanlar, asil kandan {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacılar{/g}, burnu havada lordlar... Sen de tepelerinde duran kişide zayıflık görmelerine izin veremezsin."
languages.original_text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigators{/g}, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."

Sen de tepelerinde duran kişide zayıflık görmelerine izin veremezsin."

languages.original_text: "Your noble descent is a sign that power lives in your very flesh and blood. You would never doubt your words or actions, never show weakness, never let an involuntary gesture or a careless word betray your fears or agitation — at least if your upbringing was as thorough as mine was in my time. Many will grovel at your feet — governors, commanders, highborn Navigators, conceited lords — and you cannot allow them to sense weakness in the one who stands above them."
